00001 <?php
00002 /**

00008 require_once 'PHPUnit/Autoload.php';
00009 require_once 'src/QueryPath/QueryPath.php';
00010 require_once 'src/QueryPath/Extension/QPTPL.php';
00011 /**
00012  * @ingroup querypath_tests
00013  */
00014 class QPTPLTest extends PHPUnit_Framework_TestCase {
00015   
00016   public function testIsAssoc() {
00017     $t = new QPTPL(qp());
00018     $this->assertTrue($t->isAssoc(array('one' => '0', 'two' => '1')));
00019     $this->assertTrue($t->isAssoc(array('0' => '0', 'two' => '1')));
00020     $this->assertFalse($t->isAssoc(array(0,1,2)));
00021     // Test manual key assignment:
00022     $this->assertFalse($t->isAssoc(array(0 => 1, 1 => 2, 2 => 3)));
00023     // Index not in order:
00024     $this->assertTrue($t->isAssoc(array(0 => 0,3 => 1,2 => 2)));
00025   }
00026   
00027   public function testTplArray() {
00028     $xml = '<?xml version="1.0"?><root/>';
00029     $tpl = '<?xml version="1.0"?><data><item class="myclass"/><item id="one"/></data>';
00030     $data = array('.myclass' => 'VALUE', '#one' => '<b>OTHER VALUE</b>');
00031     $qp = qp($xml, 'root')->tpl($tpl, $data);
00032     $this->assertEquals('VALUE', $qp->find(':root .myclass')->text());
00033     $this->assertEquals(1, $qp->find(':root b')->size());
00034   }
00035   
00036   public function testTplUnmarkedArray() {
00037     $xml = '<?xml version="1.0"?><root/>';
00038     $tpl = '<?xml version="1.0"?><data><item class="myclass"/><item class="other"/></data>';
00039     $data = array('myclass' => 'VALUE', 'other' => '<b>OTHER VALUE</b>');
00040     $qp = qp($xml, 'root')->tpl($tpl, $data);
00041     $this->assertEquals('VALUE', $qp->find(':root .myclass')->text());
00042     $this->assertEquals(1, $qp->find(':root b')->size());
00043   }
00044   
00045   public function testTplObject() {
00046     $xml = '<?xml version="1.0"?><root/>';
00047     $tpl = '<?xml version="1.0"?><data><item class="MyClass"/><item id="one"/></data>';
00048     $o = new IntrospectMe();
00049     $qp = qp($xml)->tpl($tpl, $o);
00050     $this->assertEquals('FOO', $qp->find('.MyClass')->text());
00051     
00052     $tpl = '<?xml version="1.0"?><data><item class="MyClass"/><item class="OtherData"/></data>';
00053     $o = new FixtureTwo();
00054     $qp = qp($xml)->tpl($tpl, $o);
00055     $this->assertEquals(2, $qp->find('.MyClass br')->size());
00056     $this->assertEquals('This is a message', $qp->find(':root .OtherData')->text());
00057     
00058   }
00059   
00060   public function testTplAll() {
00061     $xml = '<?xml version="1.0"?><root/>';
00062     $tpl = '<?xml version="1.0"?><data><first class="Baz"/><item class="MyClass"/><item class="otherData"/></data>';
00063     $objects = array(new IntrospectMe(), new FixtureOne(), new FixtureTwo()); 
00064     $qp = qp($xml)->tplAll($tpl, $objects);
00065     
00066     $this->assertEquals('FOOFOO', $qp->find('.MyClass')->text());
00067     $this->assertEquals(1, $qp->find(':root #baz')->size());
00068     $this->assertTrue($qp->is('#baz'));
00069   }
00070   
00071   public function testTplMultiClass() {
00072     $xml = '<?xml version="1.0"?><root/>';
00073     $tpl = '<?xml version="1.0"?><data><item class="classb myclass classc"/><item id="one"/></data>';
00074     $data = array('.myclass' => 'VALUE', '#one' => '<b>OTHER VALUE</b>');
00075     $qp = qp($xml, 'root')->tpl($tpl, $data);
00076     $this->assertEquals('VALUE', $qp->find(':root .myclass')->text());
00077     $this->assertEquals(1, $qp->find(':root b')->size());
00078   }
00079   
00080   public function testTplRecursion() {
00081 
00082     $tpl = '<?xml version="1.0"?><table>
00083     <tbody>
00084       <tr class="header-row">
00085         <th class="header1"/>
00086         <th class="header2"/>
00087       </tr>
00088       <tr class="table-row">
00089         <td class="cell1"></td>
00090         <td class="cell2"></td>
00091       </tr>
00092     </tbody>
00093     </table>';
00094     
00095     $data['.header1'][] = 'Header One';
00096     $data['.header2'][] = 'Header Two';
00097     $data['.table-row'][] = array(
00098       '.cell1' => 'Cell One',
00099       '.cell2' => 'Cell Two',
00100     );
00101     $data['.table-row'][] = array(
00102       '.cell1' => 'Cell Three',
00103       '.cell2' => 'Cell Four',
00104     );
00105     $data['.table-row'][] = array(
00106       '.cell1' => 'Cell Five',
00107       '.cell2' => 'Cell Six',
00108     );
00109     $qp = qp(QueryPath::HTML_STUB, 'body')->tpl($tpl, $data);
00110     $this->assertEquals('Cell Six', $qp->top()->find('.table-row:last .cell2')->text());
00111     $this->assertEquals(6, $qp->top()->find('td')->size());
00112     
00113     // Test with class substitution for multiple items
00114     // and same class.
00115     $tpl = '<?xml version="1.0"?>
00116     <div>
00117     <ul class="list">
00118       <li class="item"/>
00119     </ul>
00120     </div>';
00121     
00122     $data = array();
00123     $data['.item'][] = 'One';
00124     $data['.item'][] = 'Two';
00125     $data['.item'][] = 'Three';
00126     $data['.item'][] = 'Four';
00127     
00128     $qp = qp(QueryPath::HTML_STUB, 'body')->tpl($tpl, $data);
00129     $this->assertEquals(4, $qp->top('.item')->size());
00130     
00131     // Same test as before, but with one item set to NULL.
00132     $data = array();
00133     $data['.item'][] = 'One';
00134     $data['.item'][] = 'Two';
00135     $data['.item'][] = NULL;
00136     $data['.item'][] = 'Four';
00137     
00138     $qp = qp(QueryPath::HTML_STUB, 'body')->tpl($tpl, $data);
00139     $this->assertEquals(4, $qp->top('.item')->size());
00140     $this->assertEquals('One', $qp->eq(0)->text());
00141     $this->assertEquals('', $qp->eq(2)->text());
00142     
00143   }
00144   
00145   public function testTplTraversable() {
00146     // Test that a Traversable will work.
00147     $tpl = '<?xml version="1.0"?><data><item class="classb myclass classc"/><item id="one"/></data>';
00148     $data = new ArrayIterator(array('.myclass' => 'VALUE', '#one' => '<b>OTHER VALUE</b>'));
00149     $qp = qp(QueryPath::HTML_STUB, 'body')->tpl($tpl, $data);
00150     $this->assertEquals('VALUE', $qp->top()->find('.myclass')->text());
00151   }
00152   
00153 }

00157 class IntrospectMe {

00170 /**
00171  * @ingroup querypath_tests
00172  */
00173 class FixtureTwo {
00174   private $db;
00175   
00176   public function __construct() {
00177     $this->db = new PDO('sqlite:./test/db/qpTest2.db');
00178     $this->db->setAttribute(PDO::ATTR_ERRMODE, PDO::ERRMODE_EXCEPTION);
00179     $this->db->exec('CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS test (message TEXT)');
00180     $this->db->exec('INSERT INTO test (message) VALUES ("This is a message")');
00181   }
00182   
00183   public function __destruct() {
00184     $this->db->exec('DROP TABLE test');
00185   }
00186   
00187   public function getMyClass() {
00188     return '<br/>FOO<br/>';
00189   }
00190   
00191   public function getOtherData() {
00192     $stmt = $this->db->prepare('SELECT message FROM test');
00193     $stmt->execute();
00194     
00195     $o = $stmt->fetchObject();
00196     $msg = $o->message;
00197     $stmt->closeCursor();
00198     return $msg;
00199   }
00200 }
